<p><i><b>Chamaenerion angustifolium</b></i> is a perennial herbaceous flowering plant in the willowherb family Onagraceae. It is known in North America as <b>fireweed</b> and in Britain and Ireland as <b>rosebay willowherb</b>. It is also known by the synonyms <i>Chamerion angustifolium</i> and <i>Epilobium angustifolium</i>.
